title: 废青团有telegram频道了 还扬言收到粉红举报反贼 发现没有？
contents:
大家要小心了，千万不要用大陆手机号注册telegram还在群里发反贼言论，今天把我恶心到了，废青团竟然把他们的优良传统带到telegram了，还中国梦，建议有telegram账号的集体举报这个频道，不要再让它在telegram祸害反贼了。

废青团账号：t.me/@gqtfb



举报理由选 other

参考理由：
This account is the official mouthpiece of the Communist Party of China. China is in the midst of an epidemic and the country is in distress. However, this account collects and analyzes all tg group user data and chat data that are concerned about 2019nCoV, and submits it to the official Communist Party of China. This is a political persecution. A serious threat to our personal safety, we need freedom of speech and ask your company to ban this account
